WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 04 JAN 19
   BY M/V SUBSEA VIKING WITH SUBMERSIBLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-31.40S 042-46.25W, 24-41.50S 042-41.04W,
   24-32.53S 042-20.83W, 24-22.58S 042-26.15W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3966/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 JAN 19.
